details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.20 Link and Reference - Different locations
details.description: Link annotations that target different locations shall be in separate Link or Reference structure elements

rule.description: Link annotations that target different locations shall be in separate Link or Reference structure elements

error.message: Struct element %1 contains Link annotations %1 and %2 that target different locations
